content.prompt: The transmission control protocol (TCP) and Internet protocol (IP) are used in Internet communication. Which of the following best describes the purpose of these protocols?

choices.label: To ensure that communications between devices on the Internet are above a minimum transmission speed
To ensure that private data is inaccessible to unauthorized devices on the Internet
To establish a common standard for sending messages between devices on the Internet
To validate the ownership of encryption keys used in Internet communication

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Explain how computing systems work.
